title: Bandolero (band)
text:
Bandolero was a French band best known for its 1983 dance hit "Paris Latino". The group was composed of the two brothers Carlos and Jos√© Perez (both formerly of the punk rock band Guilty Razors) and Jill Merme-Bourezak.
